com.gexin.rp.sdk.base
接口 IIGtPush

所有已知实现类：
IGtPush
public interface IIGtPush

推送的主要接口
Push main interface

作者：
John.Chai

方法摘要
 boolean cancelContentId(java.lang.String contentId)
          根据contentId取消上传的消息体
remove the common content of batch push task，after you call this method, any push request for this content will be ignored, but the clients still receive messages which already have been sent.
 void close()
          取消鉴权，不建议直接调用
Cancel authentication.
 boolean connect()
          鉴权，不建议直接调用, 内部已经调用
Authentication.
 com.gexin.rp.sdk.base.IBatch getBatch()
          返回一个IBatch实例供批量推送调用
Get interface instance, to process batch task, you can see IBatch interface for details.
 java.lang.String getContentId(ListMessage message)
          批量推送前需要通过这个接口向服务其申请一个“ContentID”
Push in bulk needs to send request through this interface to get a ContentID, this ID identify the common content for a push task
 IPushResult pushMessageToApp(AppMessage message)
          推送消息到条件限定的用户，限定条件由AppMessage中的参数控制， 如果没有任何限定条件，将会此App的对所有用户进行推送
Push messages to certain users, requirements set by parameters of AppMessage, if no requirements then push to all users of this App
 void pushMessageToList(ListMessage message, com.gexin.rp.sdk.base.IListProvider listProvider, com.gexin.rp.sdk.base.IPushEventListener listener)
          推送消息到一组用户，该方法先从listProvider的实现类中获得一批用户。
 IPushResult pushMessageToList(java.lang.String contentId, java.util.List<Target> targetList)
          通过getContentId(ListMessage message)接口 获得“ContentID”后，通过这个方法实现批量推送。
 IPushResult pushMessageToSingle(SingleMessage message, Target target)
          推送一条消息到某个客户端
Push a message to a client appointed by target parameter
 IPushResult pushMessageToSingle(SingleMessage message, Target target, java.lang.String requestId)
          推送一条消息到某个客户端
Push a message to a client appointed by target parameter
 boolean stop(java.lang.String contentId)
          停止某次任务，以ContentID作为标识 通过这个方法，可以取消正在发送中的某次任务， 服务器会抛弃所有正在推送中该任务的所有消息， 以及这个任务相关的离线消息，但是已经下发到 手机的消息就无法再收回了。
 

方法详细信息

connect

boolean connect()
                throws java.io.IOException
鉴权，不建议直接调用, 内部已经调用
Authentication. It is not suggest to use this method because this method is called by system.
Note: in http version, it's just mean process the security validation, and call it only once when you initial the instance.

返回：
true -- 连接成功 false -- 连接失败
true -- connection successful false -- connection failure
抛出：
java.io.IOException - 出现任何连接异常 For any IO Exceptions

close

void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
取消鉴权，不建议直接调用
Cancel authentication. It is not suggest to use this method.

抛出：
java.io.IOException - if some net work exception happened

pushMessageToSingle

IPushResult pushMessageToSingle(SingleMessage message,
                                Target target)
推送一条消息到某个客户端
Push a message to a client appointed by target parameter

参数：
message - 消息
message information
target - 目标用户 target client
返回：
推送结果 push result

pushMessageToSingle

IPushResult pushMessageToSingle(SingleMessage message,
                                Target target,
                                java.lang.String requestId)
推送一条消息到某个客户端
Push a message to a client appointed by target parameter

参数：
message - 消息
target - 目标用户 target client
requestId - 请求序列
返回：
推送结果 push result

pushMessageToList

void pushMessageToList(ListMessage message,
                       com.gexin.rp.sdk.base.IListProvider listProvider,
                       com.gexin.rp.sdk.base.IPushEventListener listener)
推送消息到一组用户，该方法先从listProvider的实现类中获得一批用户。 然后发送到个推上，每推送完一批就再次从listProvider中获得一批用户。 直到，listProvider不再返回任何用户。 同时每发送一次，就会触发IPushEventListener的事件可以实现该接口获得发送的结果信息
Push messages to a group of users, this method gets a bunch of users in listProvider type and then send to Getui, each time it finishes it reload another bunch of users from listProvider until no new user is returned by listProvider. Each time it sends, the IPushEventListener event will be triggered thus get the sent message result.

参数：
message - 推送消息
message for push
listProvider - 列表提供类
Type:list provider
listener - 推送结果监听类
Type:Listener of push result

getContentId

java.lang.String getContentId(ListMessage message)
批量推送前需要通过这个接口向服务其申请一个“ContentID”
Push in bulk needs to send request through this interface to get a ContentID, this ID identify the common content for a push task

参数：
message -
返回：

cancelContentId

boolean cancelContentId(java.lang.String contentId)
根据contentId取消上传的消息体
remove the common content of batch push task，after you call this method, any push request for this content will be ignored, but the clients still receive messages which already have been sent.

参数：
contentId - cancelContentId(String contentId)返回是否成功
Return result true means successful false means failed
返回：

stop

boolean stop(java.lang.String contentId)
停止某次任务，以ContentID作为标识 通过这个方法，可以取消正在发送中的某次任务， 服务器会抛弃所有正在推送中该任务的所有消息， 以及这个任务相关的离线消息，但是已经下发到 手机的消息就无法再收回了。
stop the task according the contentId you can cancel the task in the server through this method. You cannot stop the job if the message have sent to the user's phone.

参数：
contentId - 内容ID
the content id of message tasks
返回：
是否成功停止
stop successful or not

pushMessageToList

IPushResult pushMessageToList(java.lang.String contentId,
                              java.util.List<Target> targetList)
通过getContentId(ListMessage message)接口 获得“ContentID”后，通过这个方法实现批量推送。
After you got Content ID though getContentId(ListMessage message) interface, you can push message to a group of users in targetList.And the length of targetList should less then 50, if you want to push more than 50 users, you should call this method iteratively.

参数：
contentId - getContentId(ListMessage message)接口返回的ID content ID returned by getContentId(ListMessage message)
targetList - 目标用户列表 target user list
返回：

pushMessageToApp

IPushResult pushMessageToApp(AppMessage message)
推送消息到条件限定的用户，限定条件由AppMessage中的参数控制， 如果没有任何限定条件，将会此App的对所有用户进行推送
Push messages to certain users, requirements set by parameters of AppMessage, if no requirements then push to all users of this App

参数：
message - 推送消息 push message
返回：

getBatch

com.gexin.rp.sdk.base.IBatch getBatch()
返回一个IBatch实例供批量推送调用
Get interface instance, to process batch task, you can see IBatch interface for details.

返回：
